title: Hardware requirements
sentence1: 1) Raspberry pi zero v1.3 (recommended) or w v1.1 [with 2*20-pin header]🤖

title: Open-sourced code
sentence1: Obtain the source code from seed signer GitHub (download the most updated version)💻

title: Getting ready
sentence1: Reload the seed into the machine RAM📼
sentence2: Scan QR-code (then enter BIP-39 passphrase [change the fingerprint] this is optional but recommended)
sentence3: For generating seed phrases and making your own QR-code pad, please refer to the instructions below📄

title: Dice method for generating seed phrases
BIP-39 passphrase
sentence1: Apply a BIP-39 passphrase (combine with text, number and special char) is highly recommended🔐
sentence2: This is a more secure approach to avoid anyone retrieving your seed phrases simply by chance/luck!
